title: Payment Method Verification Failed
description: Customer is trying to add a new credit card, but it keeps showing a generic verification error.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: The main analytics dashboard takes more than 15 seconds to load for users with large datasets.

title: Missing Notification Alerts
description: Desktop notifications are not appearing even though the settings are enabled in the browser.

title: API Connection Timeout
description: External integration is failing due to frequent timeout errors on the /v1/sync endpoint.

title: Profile Picture Upload Error
description: Users receive a 403 Forbidden error when attempting to change their profile picture.

title: Duplicate Billing Charges
description: Customer was charged twice for the monthly subscription in the January billing cycle.

title: Search Filter Not Working
description: The date range filter in the transaction history page does not return any results.

title: Export to CSV Failing
description: Clicking 'Export to CSV' results in a 500 Internal Server Error for large reports.

title: Account Deactivation Request
description: Customer wants to permanently close their account but cannot find the option in settings.

title: Dark Mode UI Glitch
description: Text becomes unreadable (white on white) in certain modals when Dark Mode is active.
